input.sentences: the family got together for a big dinner .
the kids had a lot of fun
the adults also enjoyed each others company .
grandma watched over all the events with her coffee in hand .
output.sentences: Last weekend, I attended a family dinner.
I had lots of fun seeing all the kids.
My nephew and I spent some time playing before dinner.
During the dinner, I enjoyed the company at the adults' table.
Although, it was a bit creepy how Grandma watched me for a while and then asked if I had given my hand in marriage.
